name: Santa Dash from Santa Guy
description:
Welcome to Santa Dash

The festive version of the popular Guy Phone App.

You are little Santa. As he runs over the rooftops, collect the mince pies and see how far you can go.
Don't let Santa fall off the roof else he'll have to climb back up and start again.

Avoid the chimney pots, the ice and snowmen. A simple game but very addictive

Check out all our other great FREE Santa Apps including...

Santa Radio - Christmas music 24/7 hosted by Santa
Santa Voicemail - Leave a message for Santa and the workshop
Santa Text - Have a fun chat with Santa by text (remember to be nice)
Just ask Santa - Ask a question and press Rudolph's nose for an answer.
Sleeps til Santa - Countdown and sing along with Santa as Christmas gets closer.

To get in touch to suggest updates or ideas to improve our collect, we welcome feedback.

www.santaguy.co.uk

Merry Christmas to you all from Santa, Aston & Nacnud the Elves.
